nodes.text: Horoth Gendi was a male Nikto who was the slave of a Hutt well before the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Gendi saved the life of his Hutt master in an act of quick-thinking bloodshed, and in reward the Hutt formally bequeathed the Nikto Sector, a region of the city-moon Nar Shaddaa that had been known as a place for Nikto warriors to visit in order to gain employers, to Gendi. Gendi formed his own gang and used their aid to free himself from servitude, and a succession of Nikto gangs assumed control of the Nikto Sector in the years that followed.
Horoth Gendi was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Nikto Sector in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
